(On Monday of February 6, 2023).  In The Matter of Introductory Biology and Cell Signaling Therein: 1) Cellular Signaling of Primary Messenger Type onto Second Messenging; 2) G-Protein Coupled Receptors (GPCR);  3) Phosphorylation as an Important Biochemical Reaction Of Activation And at Other Times Deactivation Modality; 4) Genome (Totality of Genes Within The Species) the Genotype Aspect of Biology Rather Than Phenotype (Outward Manifestaton of the Genes); 5) Signaling in the Diverse Extents: 1) Cytoplasmic; 2) Nuclear; 3) Endocrine (Paracrine, Juxtacrine, Autocrine);  Otherwise the Biochemical Signs and Regulation Modality of Homeostasis within an Organism;  PhD Barbara Imperiali.  Es is nicht rein gut aber gut.  Heil!
